mapper.insert: insert into fund_history (id, fi_id, time, netvalue, rate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{netvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into fund_history
id,
fi_id,
time,
netvalue,
rate,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=DATE},
#{netvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update fund_history
fi_id = #{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE},
netvalue = #{netvalue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from fund_history where fi_id=#{fiId} and time=#{time}
select min(time) from fund_history where fi_id=#{fiId}
select max(time) from fund_history where fi_id=#{fiId}
